title: A Review of Episode 1217 Nimesh Patel
description:
Nimesh is a comedian and SNL writer who was recently asked to leave during his set at a university for a joke he made that was seen as offensive. His conversation with Joe highlights what’s happening with comedy today and the shutting down of free speech. It’s a very enlightening conversation to make sure to check it out.

Enjoy my review folks!
